Subskills.name: Caustic Liquid
Subskills.description: Increases poisoned damage inflicted by caustic spearhead.

Subskills.name: Caustic Arc
Subskills.description: Split spearheads into multiple arrows in a circle around the target on hit.

Subskills.name: Fierce Spearheads
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by caustic spearhead.

Subskills.name: Venomous Touch
Subskills.description: Inflicts the target with stacks of venom on hit increasing damage dealt by poisoned.

Subskills.name: Splintering Arrows
Subskills.description: Spearheads have a chance to fork on hit with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Tribal Hunter's Aim
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using caustic spearhead.

Subskills.name: Venomous Burst
Subskills.description: Whenever a monster reaches maximum stacks of venom it unleashes a burst of poison dealing the full damage of venom consuming it.

Subskills.name: Additional Venom
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Arrow Wound
Subskills.description: Chance for spearheads to get stuck on enemies dealing damage over time for a short period.

Subskills.name: Erupting Spearheads
Subskills.description: Chance for spearheads to explode on hit dealing increased damage with increased area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Caustic Rampage
Subskills.description: Fire additional smaller spearheads in a tighter spread increasing chance of dealing critical strikes and dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Toxic Spores
Subskills.description: Caustic spearhead leaves spores behind seeking nearby monsters and exploding on hit dealing additional damage and inflicting poisoned.
